nodes.text: The Second Anthology is the second set of a three-part Star Wars Customizable Card Game anthology series released in July 1998. The contents of the set included two Dagobah Limited packs, two Cloud City Limited packs, eight Premiere Unlimited packs, and six white-bordered preview cards from the then upcoming sets of Special Edition Limited, Endor Limited, and Death Star II Limited. The six preview cards were:
All of the above cards were later printed in black border when they were released in their expansion sets.
The Second Anthology was released in an 800-card storage box that was desert sand in color with a sliding cover that was porous.
